bug.author: brollb
bug.description: Unfortunately, the zip file format is transitioning out (of webgme v2.x) and the library support isn't quite right in the imported zip files.

comments.comment: For now, I will add both the webgmex files and the old zip file formats to src/seeds/seedName. The old format (zip files) will be used for tests and the new format will be used for actually loading the files into the browser. Unfortunately, this means that updating the test files will be done with webgme new seed devTests and updating the browser version (webgmex format) will be done by clicking the branch name on the top bar then Export branch and copying it to the src/seeds/devTests directory
